title: Tesla (TSLA.US) Sags 4% as Broker Cuts TP, Rating
text: Wells Fargo Bank downgraded Tesla, Inc. (TSLA.US)       to Underweight, expressing its concern over weakening demand for its electric vehicles (EVs). Tesla, Inc.'s share price were under significant pressure on Wednesday, and last sagged 4% to US$170.5.Investors have been highly concerned about Tesla, Inc.'s prospects since Tesla, Inc.'s CEO, Elon Musk, warned in January that the Company's growth would be significantly lower this year. Related NewsDurable Goods Orders MoM in United States for Feb is 1.4%, Exceeding ForecastWells Fargo Bank chopped its target price on Tesla, Inc. from US$200 to US$120 in its report, implying a potential downside of about 30%.(Real-time Streaming US Stocks Quote; Except All OTC quotes are at least 15 minutes delayed.)AAStocks Financial News
